abstract: HSBC, Europe’s biggest bank, said on Monday it expected to remain profitable in Taiwan in 2008, as its acquisition of a local rival will help it access more clients in Asia’s third-largest wealth management market.
lead_paragraph: HSBC, Europe’s biggest bank, said on Monday it expected to remain profitable in Taiwan in 2008, as its acquisition of a local rival will help it access more clients in Asia’s third-largest wealth management market.

headline.main: HSBC Boosted by $1.5 Billion Taiwan Deal
